name: Create an account with invalid data

testSteps.description: Create an account with invalid data #1: {email=email, password=Abcdefg0, verificationPassword=Abcdefg0, error=The email is invalid}

children.description: Given Estefania has the following data "email", "Abcdefg0" and "Abcdefg0"
When she sends a request to the registration service
POST http://172.17.228.115:9090/auth/register

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 20
Date: Mon, 21 May 2018 13:45:33 GMT
Connection: close

children.description: Then the system should retrieve "The email is invalid"
And status code "400"

testSteps.description: Create an account with invalid data #2: {email=,email@domain.co, password=Abcdefg0, verificationPassword=Abcdefg0, error=The email is invalid}

children.description: Given Estefania has the following data ",email@domain.co", "Abcdefg0" and "Abcdefg0"
When she sends a request to the registration service
POST http://172.17.228.115:9090/auth/register

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 20
Date: Mon, 21 May 2018 13:45:33 GMT
Connection: close

children.description: Then the system should retrieve "The email is invalid"
And status code "400"

testSteps.description: Create an account with invalid data #3: {email=email@domain.com, password=abcdefg0, verificationPassword=abcdefg0, error=The password must contain at least one capital letter}

children.description: Given Estefania has the following data "email@domain.com", "abcdefg0" and "abcdefg0"
When she sends a request to the registration service
POST http://172.17.228.115:9090/auth/register

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 53
Date: Mon, 21 May 2018 13:45:33 GMT
Connection: close
restQuery.responseBody: The password must contain at least one capital letter

children.description: Then the system should retrieve "The password must contain at least one capital letter"
And status code "400"

testSteps.description: Create an account with invalid data #4: {email=email@domain.com, password=Abcdefgh, verificationPassword=Abcdefgh, error=The password must contain a number}

children.description: Given Estefania has the following data "email@domain.com", "Abcdefgh" and "Abcdefgh"
When she sends a request to the registration service
POST http://172.17.228.115:9090/auth/register

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 34
Date: Mon, 21 May 2018 13:45:33 GMT
Connection: close
restQuery.responseBody: The password must contain a number

children.description: Then the system should retrieve "The password must contain a number"
And status code "400"

userStory.narrative:
As an anonymous user
  I want TO get registered
  So that I can have a profile and interact with the page

title: Create an account with invalid data

values: The password must contain at least one capital letter
The password must contain a number

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given Estefania has the following data "<email>", "<password>" and "<verificationPassword>"
When she sends a request to the registration service
Then the system should retrieve "<error>"
And status code "400"
